version_description:
Kik has a brand new look! We’ve made it more fun and easy to use, so you can spend less time hunting for photos and GIFs and more time chatting with friends and groups. Now you can:

• Quickly find friends, start groups and discover bots with a "+" menu right on the main Kik page.
• We made it easier to add your favorite photos, GIFs, and smileys while you’re chatting — they’re available right under the text field for easy access.
• Organize your thoughts with redesigned chat bubbles. When you have a lot to say and send several messages in a row, they’ll now group together.

And we’ve added lots of bug fixes and improvements to make Kik even better.

Kik has a brand new look! We’ve made it more fun and easy to use, so you can spend less time hunting for photos and GIFs and more time chatting with friends and groups. Now you can:

• Quickly find friends, start groups and discover bots with a "+" menu right on the main Kik page.
• We made it easier to add your favorite photos, GIFs, and smileys while you’re chatting — they’re available right under the text field for easy access.
• Organize your thoughts with redesigned chat bubbles. When you have a lot to say and send several messages in a row, they’ll now group together.

And we’ve added lots of bug fixes and improvements to make Kik even better.

Kik has a brand new look! We've made it more fun and easy to use, so you can spend less time hunting for photos and GIFs and more time chatting with friends and groups. Now you can:

• Quickly find friends, start groups and discover bots with a "+" menu right on the main Kik page.
• We made it easier to add your favorite photos, GIFs, stickers and smileys while you're chatting — they're available right under the text field for easy access.
• Express yourself with stickers! You'll find them in the new sticker tray. Best of all, they're free!
• Organize your thoughts with redesigned chat bubbles. When you have a lot to say and send several messages in a row, they'll now group together.
• Looking for faded D? We made the S, D and R colors darker!

You can now Video Chat on Kik! Kik is the best way to chat back-and-forth in realtime, and today you can get even more personal with video. When you're chatting one to one or in groups, just tap the video icon in the top right.

You can now Video Chat on Kik! Kik is the best way to chat back-and-forth in realtime, and today you can get even more personal with video. When you're chatting one to one or in groups, just tap the video icon in the top right.

Video Chat bubbles are bigger, and you can now use bluetooth audio!

Kik is the best way to chat back-and-forth in realtime, and you can get even more personal with video. When you're chatting one to one or in groups, just tap the video icon in the top right.

We’re back with a small update to squash some reported bugs:
• Messages should say the correct time they were received, instead of "Just Now."
• Crash fixes for users sending content with no network.
Also, Video Chat bubbles are bigger – and now you can use Bluetooth audio!

We love getting your feedback. Please keep it coming!

Public Groups are back! Search by #topic to find a group and chat about anything that interests you.

We also fixed some reported bugs:
• Messages should say the correct time they were received, instead of "Just Now."
• We added crash fixes for users sending content with no network access.
• Photos should now appear in the same order as the phone's camera roll.
Love emojis? We do too so we made them bigger! Send a message with only emojis and check it out
Love emojis? We do too so we made them bigger! Send a message with only emojis and check it out

• Reorder or remove your installed sticker packs, any way you want. Just tap on the gear icon in the Sticker Shop.
• Blocking or banning is easier: Tap on a profile picture to block, ban, or promote someone to group admin right from the chat screen.

• Looking for a specific chat? Now you can pull down your list of chats and search to find the one you want.
• Swipe down memory lane! Tap on a photo and swipe left/right to see your chat's photos, videos, and GIFs. 
• Now you can 3D Touch Kik's icon to quickly find friends, join public groups, and discover bots.

• Go darker with bubbles: We added a dark bubble color pack, including black by popular demand.
• Want to know exactly when a message was sent? Tap it to find out.
• Supersize it! Pinch to zoom before taking a photo or drag to zoom while recording a video.
• Supersize it! Pinch to zoom before taking a photo or drag to zoom while recording a video.
• Supersize it! Pinch to zoom before taking a photo or drag to zoom while recording a video.
• Supersize it! Pinch to zoom before taking a photo or drag to zoom while recording a video.
• Supersize it! Pinch to zoom before taking a photo or drag to zoom while recording a video.
• Supersize it! Pinch to zoom before taking a photo or drag to zoom while recording a video.
• Introducing photo filters! Just swipe left/right after taking a photo to apply different photo filters. Easy.
• Introducing photo filters! Just swipe left/right after taking a photo to apply different photo filters. Easy.
• Introducing photo filters! Just swipe left/right after taking a photo to apply different photo filters. Easy.

• Video Chat got an upgrade with Stickers! Swipe to the left while you're video chatting to explore funny stickers and emojis
• Group video chatting is even better – swipe left to chat full-screen with up to 5 other friends
• Our classic Sketch app has a new companion: ScribbleChat lets you create awesome animated text messages that play automatically for your friends
• Fixed a bug where some messages would appear in the chat with the wrong timestamp

• Video Chat got an upgrade with Stickers! Swipe to the left while you're video chatting to explore funny stickers and emojis
• Group video chatting is even better – swipe left to chat full-screen with up to 5 other friends
• Our classic Sketch app has a new companion: ScribbleChat lets you create awesome animated text messages that play automatically for your friends
• Fixed a bug where some messages would appear in the chat with the wrong timestamp

• Video Chat got an upgrade with Stickers! Swipe to the left while you're video chatting to explore funny stickers and emojis
• Group video chatting is even better – swipe left to chat full-screen with up to 5 other friends
• Our classic Sketch app has a new companion: ScribbleChat lets you create awesome animated text messages that play automatically for your friends

We’re always making updates to ensure the app is running as smoothly as possible for our users. As we add new features, we’ll let you know about them right here.

Thanks for using Kik!
• You can now reply to messages straight from the notification! Tap and hold on a notification to try it out on iOS 9+

• You can now reply to messages straight from the notification! Tap and hold on a notification to try it out on iOS 9+
• Now when you pull down your list of chats, the people you chat with the most are a tap away with Quick Chats

• You can now reply to messages straight from the notification! Tap and hold on a notification to try it out on iOS 9+
• Now when you pull down your list of chats, the people you chat with the most are a tap away with Quick Chats
• Fixed a bug where sometimes pictures taken in Kik wouldn't show "Camera"
• Fixed a bug where sometimes pictures taken in Kik wouldn't show "Camera"
• Express yourself in the moment with Emoji Status
• Express yourself in the moment with Emoji Status

We’re always making updates to ensure the app is running as smoothly as possible for our users. As we add new features, we’ll let you know about them right here.

Thanks for using Kik!

- We’ve made some under the hood improvements to Public Groups 
- We fixed a shifty bug with Days on Kik where it used to shift your chat down when it loaded

Thanks for using Kik!

- We’ve made some under the hood improvements to Public Groups 
- We fixed a shifty bug with Days on Kik where it used to shift your chat down when it loaded

Thanks for using Kik!
- We've made some under the hood improvements, fixed a number of issues and crashes, and more!
• We've made some general improvements, fixed a bunch of issues and crashes. Enjoy using Kik!

- We've made some under the hood performance improvements to Kik
- We fixed a few display issues you may have noticed when using Kik, one of them being an instance where "is typing..." appears when it isn't supposed to

Thanks for using Kik!

- Fixed an issue where the message preview in the chat list wasn't displaying the latest message from the chat
- Resolved two meddlesome crashes affecting your chat experience, no more shall they happen

Thanks for using Kik!

• Fixed an issue where your profile wasn't showing up in the members list of a group
• Two crashes that occurred in and around group chats have been fixed

Thanks for using Kik!

• Improved behaviour when retrieving your chats after logging in
• Fixed a crash that could occur when group info was being updated
Kik is here to stay! This update includes critical bug fixes and performance improvements.

• A fix for one of our top crashes

Thanks for using Kik!

Kik is here to stay! We're happy to announce that Kik will be staying in the app store where it has been home to millions of users and billions of conversations over the past 9 years. Thank you for your continued support!

• Fixed an issue where Kik would be stuck on Connecting...
• Fixed a crash that happened after receiving content in certain cases

Thanks for using Kik!

• Fixed a few issues around displaying Days on Kik
• Made some under the hood performance improvements 

Thanks for using Kik!

• Fixed a few issues with chat themes

Thanks for using Kik

• Fixed certain display issues for iPhone X and greater devices

Thanks for using Kik!

• Fixed a crash that could have happened when turning on Video Chat
• Fixed an issue that caused delayed keyboard input when typing after upgrading to iOS 12

Thanks for using Kik!

• Fixed a crash that happened when adding people to your group
• Fixed an issue that prevented you from viewing external content sent in Kik

• Fixed an issue that caused delayed keyboard input when typing after upgrading to iOS 12
